A.cue: Press A to drift left. Try not to scrape the walls.
A.feedback: Left lane secured. Keep twitching, I'm calibrating your failures.

D.cue: Press D to slide right. Don't wobble.
D.feedback: Right vector locked. You're barely holding it together.

SHIFT_LEFT-A.cue: Hold SHIFT, tap A to dash left. Prove you can think and move.
SHIFT_LEFT-A.feedback: Left dash confirmed. I could still run circles around you.

SHIFT_LEFT-D.cue: Hold SHIFT, tap D to dash right. Try not to eat floor.
SHIFT_LEFT-D.feedback: Right dash registered. You didn't trip-unexpected.

S.cue: Press S to crouch. Hide if you must; it won't save you.
S.feedback: Crouch engaged. Pathetic tactic, but noted.

SPACE.cue: Press SPACE to jump. Gravity likes you more than I do.
SPACE.feedback: Jump acknowledged. You fall even better than you rise.

SPACE-SPACE.cue: Press SPACE twice to double jump. Impress me for once.
SPACE-SPACE.feedback: Double jump executed. Try that when I'm actually trying to break you.

TAB.cue: Press TAB to open the map
TAB.feedback: Map online. Try not to get lost again.
